channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta AI Context Boost, Valve Reveals Mini PC And VR Headset, ElevenLabs Opens Voice Market
item.description: AR glasses gain real time visual context, Valve prepares new PC and VR hardware, and ElevenLabs launches a licensed voice market.

item.title: The PAN World Model From MBZUAI Aims To Elevate AI Simulation
item.description: The new AI world model aims to surpass LLMs by creating simulations that generalize across domains and provide better interactivity and coherence over...

item.title: Top economist Mohamed El-Erian warns the AI bubble will ‘end in tears’ and credit ‘cockroaches’ abound
item.description: El-Erian argued that AI is a "rational bubble," but some have gone "beyond their comfort zone and beyond their ability to do due diligence."

item.title: Delta CEO slams ‘inexcusable’ shutdown that led to canceled flights and workers doing high-stress jobs without pay
item.description: "There was stress, there was strain, it was completely unnecessary," Ed Bastian told Yahoo Finance's Brian Sozzi.

item.title: AI’s Impact On Employment Is Negligible, Study Asserts
item.description: Money keeps pouring into AI and technology-related investments, but there is no evidence at this point as to its impact on jobs one way or another.

item.title: Palantir CEO slams ‘parasitic’ critics calling the tech a surveillance tool: ‘Not only is patriotism right, patriotism will make you rich’
item.description: “Our project is to make America so strong we never fight,” he said. “That’s very different than being almost strong enough, so you always fight.”

item.title: 1K unionized Starbucks baristas launch labor strike at 65 stores
item.description: Starbucks strike hits Red Cup Day as over 1,000 baristas walk out at 65 stores nationwide. Union workers are protesting stalled contract talks.

item.title: Economist behind K-shaped economy sees a ‘sea of despair’ for the bottom 90% and a ‘crisis of confidence’ in the American dream
item.description: “At the bottom, this mindset develops where they recognize that they may never win, but that doesn't mean, ‘I can't help you lose,’” Peter Atwater sai...

item.title: Palantir CEO Alex Karp says this type of prestigious college grad is doomed. People with expert knowledge will ‘make a lot more money’
item.description: The leader of the $439 billion tech company says those with niche knowledge will make “a lot more money” than Ivy League graduates with general expert...

item.title: China’s Credentialing Crackdown: A Reset For The Influencer Economy
item.description: China has mandated influencers prove credentials for professional advice, aiming to curb misinformation and reshape digital authority beyond its borde...

item.title: 2 Ways To Stop Falling For The ‘Potential Trap’ In Love, By A Psychologist
item.description: Love isn’t meant to feel like waiting for someone to finally become who you dreamed they could be. Here’s how to tell if you’ve fallen for the “potent...

item.title: Shutdown delays October inflation report – what does the Fed's data say?
item.description: The government shutdown delayed the October CPI inflation report indefinitely, as alternate gauges like the Cleveland Fed's inflation nowcast estimate...

item.title: Inside Wall Street’s path to ‘always on’ overnight U.S. trading, spurred by Asia
Bitcoin sinks to 6-month low, deepning rout as long-term holders step up selling
Dow falls 800 points as major U.S. stock indexes tally worst day in over a month
Bitcoin sinks to 6-month low, as long-term holders step up selling
Dow losing over 750 points, Nasdaq shedding around 2.5% in final hour — live
New York and New Jersey lose hundreds of billions in resident income as Americans flee to low-tax states
item.description: New York and New Jersey lost nearly $700 billion in resident income from 2013-2022 as millions fled to low-tax states like Florida and Texas in histor...

item.title: How one company is transforming rural communities with tech careers
item.description: IT services company Provalus is revitalizing rural communities by bringing hundreds of technology jobs and spurring local business development.

item.title: Activist investor pushes Cracker Barrel shareholders to oust DEI specialist
item.description: Cracker Barrel faces proxy fight as activist investor claims company's rebranding "fiasco" destroyed $1.2 billion in shareholder value amid leadership...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
